pages.text:
About Us
Bringing the Beach to You!
About Do The Beach
OUR HISTORY
Do The Beach Parks is a Galaxy Multi Rides brand. We have been manufacturing fun since 1990 with manufacturing facilities in the USA & UK. Our family run company has grown from making mechanical bulls to being the world leader in inflatable multi player action games and mechanical rides. We’re putting our decades of experience to good use and bringing something truly new and exciting to a market that demands innovation.
VISION & MISSION
Our core values are that the client comes first. Safety, honesty and integrity are paramount. When we enter into a partnership with a franchise partner, our mission is to provide them with the tools and know how to make a financial success for their business. If we do our job right,
everyone is a winner!
Meet the
Team
Our executive management
team has over 80 years combined experience in the indoor family entertainment industry. We developed a well known Trampoline Park Franchise brand of 80 stores (which was sold in 2018) Our experience in franchising and operations is unrivaled. In addition our sister company Galaxy Multi Rides is the oldest and largest manufacturer of Inflatable Adventure Parks and interactive mechanical attractions. They have been innovating and manufacturing since 1990.
Since 2019 our sister company Galaxy Multi Rides has built and installed 70 Inflatable Adventure Parks. They have proven to be a huge draw for all the family
Robin Whincup CEO
CEO of Do The Beach Franchising LLC and President at Galaxy Multi Rides.
Robin has 37 years’ experience in the amusement industry, inclusive of operations, event management and manufacturing. Galaxy Multi Rides was formed in 1990 in England. Since 2008 Galaxy Multi Rides has been manufacturing their products in their factory in Port Charlotte FL. He is well connected and respected in the attractions industry.
Mike Whincup COO
COO of Do The Beach Franchising LLC and Head of design and marketing at Galaxy Multi Rides.
As well as being the Vice President of Galaxy Multi Rides he is responsible for all aspects of design; including ride and attraction concepts, inflatable park design, marketing materials and online digital media. managing all aspects of marketing and advertising including trade show planning, online/printed ads and digital campaigns.
Mike is an IAAPA certified attractions executive
and served on the space allocation committee as well as multiple dedicated IAAPA task forces. In 2020 he was nominated for the IAAPA young professional of the year.
Curt Skallerupp
|
Co-Partner
Do The Beach Adventure Parks Co-Founding Partner
, Curt Skallerup, was previously the CEO of Altitude Trampoline Parks, a company that he founded and grew to over 90 locations in eight countries, before selling to a private equity fund in 2018. Mr. Skallerup is bringing his core executive team to Do The Beach Inflatable Adventure Parks, as well as all his relationships with suppliers and franchisees.
Sarah Povazan |
Account Manager
Sarah has an extensive background and experience in management over 20 years. She knows the amusement industry inside out from manufacturing to operations. For the last 10 years she has been the VP of Operations at Galaxy Multi Rides.
Zach Barton |
VP of Finance
Zach has 10 years of finance and accounting experience in the franchising industry. He was the leader in developing and growing the accounting service program with Altitude Trampoline Park from zero to over $1M in annual revenue for the company during his time. During his time with Altitude, he also assisted franchisees with all of their financing needs (SBA, private lending, etc.). He also brings 15 years of operations and management experience to the team.
Nicole Kpornegay  |
VP of Construction
Nicole Kornegay is a Construction Project Manager with a degree in Interior Design. She began her journey as an interior designer then switched to construction management over 8 years ago and hasn’t looked back. Nicole recently sold her construction management company, loves meeting new people and enjoys the challenge that the world of construction brings.  Her biggest accomplishment to date is doing a full demo & rebuild in a 20,000 sq ft space  in 4 weeks.  Nicole splits her time between Round Rock, TX  & Mesa, AZ .
Courtney Skallerup-Wilde  |
VP of Operations
Courtney has worked in retail operations for over 15 years and has specialized in franchise operations for the last eight. Courtney started with Altitude Trampoline Parks when it had 3 open locations and helped build the brand to over 90, in 6 countries. Most recently, Courtney was the VP of Franchise Development at Tapville Social, an emerging restaurant and self-pour beer and wine concept. She helped create and implement platforms and policies to help support future growth and worked closely with key vendors ranging from Food Service to Training. Now, Courtney is the VP of Operations with Do The Beach Inflatable Adventure Parks  and will work directly with the franchise owners, vendor partners and training team.
Joseph Williams   |
VP of Real Estate
Joseph specializes in tenant representation for The Woodmont Company focusing on strategic planning, site selection, and transaction services for Do The Beach Inflatable Adventure Parks. He brings a unique background in real estate, entrepreneurship, business management and consulting services for companies in healthcare, fitness, retail, entertainment and wholesale merchandising. He has partnered with several emerging brands but one of his most notable clients was developing the growth of Altitude Trampoline park. Joseph is a native of Orange County, CA, Joseph has been a licensed real estate professional since 2004 and spent 5 years running his own independent brokerage and consulting business.
Our Unique
Experience
Do The Beach was
built by industry pioneers
who saw a gap in the market—families love themed entertainment, but
existing parks lacked innovation
. By blending active play with an immersive beach vibe, we've created an experience that’s both visually unique and endlessly fun,
setting us apart from traditional trampoline and adventure parks
.
Why choose Do The Beach?
Because we’ve taken everything families love about
themed entertainment
and
active play
, then infused it with an
immersive beach vibe
—without the sand in your shoes!
Industry Leaders with a Passion for Fun
Our team isn’t just made up of business professionals—we’re
pioneers in the family entertainment space
. With decades of experience, we’ve
developed world-class attractions
found in top amusement venues worldwide.
Designed for Maximum Play & Profitability
We don’t just build fun—we create
business success
for our franchisees. From innovative designs to cutting-edge technology like our
Intelliplay RFID system
, everything we do is crafted to
enhance guest experiences and increase revenue opportunities
.
Meet Dooey!
Our friendly mascot,
Dooey
, brings
beach vibes and high-energy fun
to every park. Kids love him, and he’s the face of our brand—creating
unforgettable moments for families
and reinforcing
customer loyalty
!

Exciting New Park!
"Do The Beach sounds like the perfect place for kids and adults. We're thrilled to have a new adventure park coming to our town!”
Family Fun Destination!
"This park has something for everyone.”
Gel Blaster Beach is One of a Kind!
"Can't wait to try it out with friends!"
Best Birthday Party Ever!
"Perfect place for an unforgettable celebration."
Something for Everyone!
"Great mix of activities for kids and adults."
Community Commitment
Bring The Beach To Your City
Tired of traditional trampoline parks? Do The Beach is the
next evolution of active entertainment
, combining
customizable attractions
,
immersive theming
, and
proven business success
. Whether you’re looking to
own a franchise
or
bring a location to your area
, our team will help
make waves in your market!
Do the Beach
News & Updates
A Family Fun Business You Can Actually Start
By
DTB Editorial Team
|
August 20, 2025
With Do the Beach’s turnkey model, franchise owners have a clear path to success with the right concept and strong support.
Why This FEC Franchise Fits Your Life
By
DTB Editorial Team

August 5, 2025
A Do the Beach franchise offers an ideal business opportunity, providing revenue, community purpose, and a lifestyle that fits you.
Rebrand Your Parks for Bigger Crowds
By

Park rebranding can be the first step in the right direction to boost foot traffic and increase business at a family entertainment center.

Birthday Parties
Beachfront Birthdays
Learn more
Team Building
Corporate Beach Bash
GET STARTED
Birthday Parties
Beachfront
Birthdays
Learn more
Team Building
Corporate Beach Bash
GET STARTED
Celebrate at the Beach!
Make your child's birthday unforgettable with our beach-themed parties. Our exciting and vibrant decorations set the perfect backdrop for a day filled with fun and adventure. Kids can dive into thrilling activities and create lasting memories with their friends and family. Our dedicated team ensures every detail is perfect, so you can sit back and enjoy the celebration. Book your beach party today and let the waves of fun roll in!
Book a Party
Beachside Team Building
Transform your corporate events into an unforgettable beachside experience. Our unique beach-themed setting offers the perfect backdrop for team-building activities, company retreats, and corporate gatherings.
Engage your team with dynamic activities that foster collaboration and boost morale. Our experienced team takes care of all the details, ensuring a seamless and productive event.
Elevate your staff events with a touch of beachside fun and create lasting memories with your colleagues. Plan your experience today!
Plan an Event
Group Adventures
Bring your group for an exciting day at The Beach. Perfect for school trips, clubs, and large gatherings, our sessions are packed with fun activities and adventures.
Kids will love exploring and playing in our vibrant setting, fostering teamwork and making new friends. Our dedicated team ensures everything runs smoothly, so you can focus on enjoying the day.
Book your group adventure today and let the beach fun begin!
Get Details
Private Beach Parties
Host an exclusive event at our beach-themed park with private access for you and your guests.
Perfect for any special occasion, our private park rentals offer a unique and unforgettable experience. Enjoy personalized service and a variety of customizable options to make your event truly special.
Plan your private beach party today and create memories that will last a lifetime!
Plan an Event

FAQs
How long does it take to receive a response?
Expand
We aim to respond within
24-48 hours
. During peak times, responses may take slightly longer.
How do I contact a specific location?
Expand
Use the
Find My Location
tool above to access location-specific details, including direct contact information.
Who do I contact for franchise opportunities?
Expand
Visit our
Franchise Opportunities
page or submit an inquiry through the contact form above.
How do I book a party or event?
Expand
Head to our
Parties & Events
page
to explore booking options or reach out via the contact form for special requests.
